EmailTemplate.subject: LAST CHANCE: One Week Left Save on Your Honeywell ADS-B Out Upgrade
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://www.duncanaviation.aero/]]>
Do not miss your chance to save money on your ADS-B Out upgrade!
Schedule your ADS-B Out upgrade with Duncan Aviation today before Honeywell’s temporary price reduction for RM-850/855-equipped aircraft ends on May 31.
As the forward-fit avionics provider of your aircraft, Honeywell gives you an easy way to upgrade your existing Primus® II Radio and add a stand-alone GPS receiver to meet the ADS-B Out mandate, which allows you to keep your Honeywell Avionics Protection Plan (HAPP) in-tact.
According to Duncan Aviation’s most recent report, more than 58% of U.S. business jets are not ADS-B compliant. Don’t run the risk of having your aircraft grounded when the deadline hits.
Time is running out for you to save on your Honeywell ADS-B Out upgrade. Schedule your appointment with Duncan Aviation’s ADS-B Now program and reserve your slot today!
SPECIAL OFFER: Receive 50% off the 1st year and 25% off your 2nd and 3rd years on a new Honeywell Avionics Protection Plan (HAPP) when you upgrade using Duncan Aviation's ADS-B Out STC.
UPGRADE TODAY <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Hawker_Citation_Duncan.html]]>
